spans.description: SELECT u.id, u.email, p.phone_number, a.city FROM "users" AS u LEFT JOIN "profiles" AS p ON u.id = p.user_id AND p."deleted_at" IS NULL LEFT JOIN "addresses" AS a ON p.address_id = a.id AND a.deletedAt IS NULL LEFT JOIN "subscriptions" AS s ON u.id = s.user_id AND s."deletedAt" IS NULL WHERE u.deleted_at IS NULL and email = 'bob@example.com';
